title: Ep. 152: Obsessed with Glow with Patrick Ta
itunes:title: Ep. 152: Obsessed with Glow with Patrick Ta
itunes:subtitle: Patrick Ta went from bankruptcy at age 21 to having his own line at Sephora seven years later. Now, the makeup artist shares the lessons he’s learned along the way, including how to highlight like a Hadid, which bronzer makes the best eye shadow, and w...
description:
Patrick Ta went from bankruptcy at age 21 to having his own line at Sephora seven years later. Now, the makeup artist shares the lessons he’s learned along the way, including how to highlight like a Hadid, which bronzer makes the best eye shadow, and why a fan should be in your beauty kit. Plus, sunscreen for women of color and Jenn gets a lesson in Gen Z beauty trends from intern Tiff.


Want more Fat Mascara?
